```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
peas_data = read.csv(file = "./data/RawDataPeas.csv", header = TRUE)

head(peas_data)

```

```{r}
live = peas_data

for(i in nrow(peas_data):1) {
    if(peas_data[i,4] != "L") {
        live = live[-i,] 
    }
}

nrow(live)
head(live)
```

```{r}
boiled = peas_data

for(i in nrow(peas_data):1) {
    if(peas_data[i,4] != "B") {
        boiled = boiled[-i,] 
    }
}

nrow(boiled)
head(boiled)
```

```{r}
plot(peas_data$Abs_Blk)
```

```{r}
peas_data = peas_data[-17,]
nrow(peas_data)
```

```{r}
plot(peas_data$Abs_Blk)
```

```{r}
plot(peas_data$Diam, peas_data$Abs_Blk)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(peas_data, aes(x=peas_data$Diam, y=peas_data$Abs_Blk, color=peas_data$Trmt)) + geom_point()


```

```{r}
ggplot(peas_data, aes(x=peas_data$Abs_Blk, fill=peas_data$Trmt)) + geom_histogram(binwidth=.02)
```

```{r}
mean_live = mean(live$Abs_Blk)
mean_boiled = mean(boiled$Abs_Blk)

class(mean_live)
```

```{r}
ggplot(peas_data, aes(x=peas_data$Abs_Blk, fill=peas_data$Trmt)) +  scale_fill_manual(values = alpha(c("blue", "red"))) + geom_histogram(binwidth=.01) + geom_vline(xintercept = mean_live, color = "red") +geom_vline(xintercept = mean_boiled, color = "blue")
```

```{r}
sd(live$Abs_Blk)
sd(boiled$Abs_Blk)
```
